endDate.description:
The Recurring End Date is calculated based on the
            start date, number of cycles, and cycle type.

chargeToType.description:
Gets or sets
            company or chargeToType is required.

templateSetupId.description: Can be obtained via InvoiceTemplate report.

emailTemplateId.description: Can be obtained via InvoiceEmailTemplate report.

departmentId.description: departmentId is only required for special invoices.

chargeToId.description: If chargeToId is not specified, we asume you enter time against the company specified

chargeToType.description: If chargeToId is not specified, we asume you enter time against the company specified

emailResourceFlag.description: This is an action flag. To update this value use the /service/tickets endpoint automaticEmailResourceFlag field

emailContactFlag.description: This is an action flag. To update this value use the /service/tickets endpoint automaticEmailContactFlag field

emailCcFlag.description: This is an action flag. To update this value use the /service/tickets endpoint automaticEmailCcFlag field

emailCc.description: To update this value use the /service/tickets endpoint automaticEmailCc field

hourlyRate.description: This field may only be Updated, it is defaulted on Create

id.description: Gets or sets invoice Template Setup Id.

avalaraTaxFlag.description: Used to determine if Avalara tax is enabled.

stateTaxFlag.description: Set to true if transaction is taxable at the state level.

countyTaxFlag.description: Set to true if transaction is taxable at the county level.

cityTaxFlag.description: Set to true if transaction is taxable at the city level.

countryTaxFlag.description: Set to true if transaction is taxable at the country level.

compositeTaxFlag.description: Set to true if transaction is taxable at the composite level.

levelSixTaxFlag.description: Set to true if transaction is taxable at level six.
